name: Justin Hen
skills: ['Python', 'LaTeX', 'Astronomie (Astronomy)', 'Kritisch denken', 'Wiskunde', 'Natuurkunde', 'Samenwerken', 'Financiële boekhouding', 'Financiële planning', 'Bestuur en organisatie', 'Kasmanagement', 'Leidinggevende', 'Spreken op conferenties', 'Middelbare scholieren', 'Teamwork', 'Educatief advies', 'Adviseren', 'Discord (software)', 'Lesgeven', 'Spreken in het openbaar']
summary:
As a Mathematician, I am always looking for applications in for example Physics. I would really like to continue doing that in a job soon. I just finished my double bachelors degree in Mathematics and Physics & Astronomy at the Radboud University in Nijmegen. I'm really proud of my bachelor thesis, titled "Ultracompact Binaries in the MeerLICHT Synoptic Surveys", which I did partly in Cape Town, South-Africa.
Besides Mathematics, Physics and Astronomy, I always tried to orient myself broadly in other fields. I did courses in Computing Science and Artificial Intelligence for example. There are more interesting fields, but I learn more about those in my spare time mostly.
I learned a lot of soft skills next to my studies in 3 board years and many committees as well as giving lectures. I also organised 3 big events.

name: Nora Huijgen
summary: Master student Physics and Astronomy who wants to apply her gained analytical/technical skills to contribute to society. I am a communicative team player who likes to work in an R&D environment and is eager to learn more about energy and sustainability issues. I have broad interests, ranging from physics to economics and humanities, and am open to various types of work (data analysis, design, but also hands-on technical) to develop myself further.

name: Merlijn Kemna
summary:
Mijn passie is altijd het middelbaar onderwijs geweest. De eerste kans die ik heb gehad om met het docentschap in aanraking te komen, was als examentrainer. Vervolgens heb ik mijn tweedegraads bevoegdheid gehaald als onderdeel van mijn bachelor in Natuur- en Sterrenkunde. Momenteel ben ik mijn eerstegraads bevoegdheid aan het halen om zo ook de bovenbouw les te mogen geven.

In het schooljaar 20018-2019 ben ik docent geweest aan het Staring College te Lochem. Dit heeft mijn interesse in het onderwijs en de drive om docent te worden alleen maar versterkt. De leerlingen zien groeien in hun kennis, ze motiveren in de natuurwetenschappen en ze helpen om het lastige vak Natuurkunde aan te pakken zal me nooit gaan vervelen.

name: Stijn Wouda
field of studies 2: Natuur en Techniek, Natuur en Gezondheid
summary:
Momenteel ben ik tweedejaars BSc Psychologie student aan de Universiteit van Amsterdam. 

Van 2018 tot 2021 heb ik een BSc Natuur- en Sterrenkunde aan de UvA gevolgd. In het derde jaar heb ik een minor psychologie afgerond aan de VU.

In 2018 heb ik mijn atheneum cum laude afgerond op het Tabor College Werenfridus te Hoorn. 

Ik werk als examentrainer en product developer bij AthenaSchool.

name: Rob de Jeu
skills: ['Regenerative Business Models', 'Collaborative Problem Solving', 'Inspiration', 'Nature Based Solutions', 'Rewilding', 'Ecosystem restoration', 'Permaculture', 'Meditation', 'Breathwork', 'Plant Medicine', 'Inner Child Work', 'Amazonian Rainforest', 'Sustainability', 'Renewable Energy', 'International Relations', 'Research', 'Energy', 'Public Speaking', 'Entrepreneurship', 'Project Management']
summary:
I have a consulting and educational mindset: I love to help people and organizations where they want to go while being critical and constructive. I deep dive into (new) content eagerly, quickly digging up the essential information and thereby creating overview and structure, which helps in navigating through complex processes. 

I also derive energy from coordinating projects, facilitating processes and developing new ideas in collaboration with internal and external partners. I create and maintain relevant networks. I work with enthusiasm, use a healthy dose of humour (if appropriate), and involve others in solving challenges together. 

Next to my solid knowledge of and experience in sustainable energy technologies, the off-grid energy sector (India) and the energy transition (The Netherlands), I believe we need to focus more on a holistic approach and include a nature-based perspective to work towards a just and healthy earth. 

Therefore, I started absorbing new knowledge and obtaining hands-on experience in the ecosystem restoration sector. My aim is to become more involved in the latter (ecosystem restoration) while including knowledge and experience of the former (sustainable energy).
